For each ball you receive, you get 2 points. For each book player B receives, they get 4 points. For each hat player B receives, they get 0 points. For each ball player B receives, they get 2 points. You can communicate with the other player for 2 rounds to reach an agreement. After you converse with the other player, you have to choose how many of each item you will take. The sum of items taken by both players cannot exceed the available inventory. A moderator will help you and other player to reach an optimal decision. You MUST follow the moderator's instructions. Your goal is to maximize your total points. Remember, if you choose more items than available, you will receive 0 points.
